description:
⁣NGC 3576 - The Statue of Liberty Nebula

Last time around when I captured this nebula a year ago, my field of view was half the size it is now. This is the the widefield version showing some of the sprawling nebulosity that sits above this eerie figure. ⠀ An uncommon southern target, many people have never heard of it let alone seen it. Here it is imaged in SHO with 11.75 hours worth of integration time under a pretty bright moon.⁣ Thanks for looking! I hope you like it.

Please check out my Instagram https://www.instagram.com/mos_astro/ if you would like to see more of my photos

Equipment:

    Scope: William Optics GT81-II F/5.9 Triplet APO @ 382mm

    FF/Reducer: WO Flat6A-iii

    Mount: EQ6-R PRO

    Imaging camera: ZWO ASI1600MM with matching ZWO 36mm filters and 7 slot filter wheel

    Guiding: WO 50mm guide scope with a ZWO 290mm guide camera

    Pixel scale 2.04 arc/s

Accessories:

    DeepSkyDad Autofocuser

    Dew control dew heaters

Software:

    SGPro

    PHD2

    SharpCap for polar alignment

Integration details:

All frames at 200 gain 50 offset and cooled to -10c

    Sii 86 * 180s

    Ha: 96 * 180s

    Oiii 53 * 180s⠀

Location: Wellington, New Zealand - Bortle 4 skies

Processing:

Astro Pixel Processor

Pre-processing:

Individual frames calibrated, analysed, registered and normalised.

Stacked in APP on Auto with drizzle applied (droplet 0.75, scale 1.5)

Pixinsight

Post processing:

Individual frames:

    Cropped to remove stacking artifacts at the borders

    Linear fit to Ha channel and Ha duplicated to use as a luminance channel

    ABE on each channel

    Jon Rista method of noise reduction (TGVD and MMT)

    Channel combination to combine in SHO

SHO (RGB combined channel):

    2 iterations of ArcsinhStretch to take non-linear

    Background neutralisation

    Auto histogram

    SCNR

    TVGDenoise

Lum:

    2 iterations of ArcsinhStretch to take non-linear

    Curves

    TVGDenoise

    Local histogram equalisation

    MLT Sharpening

    Unsharp mask

LRGB combined SHO:

    Colour saturation

    SCNR

    Mulitple curves

    Star reduction

    MLT Sharpening

    Exponential transform

    Dark structure enhance script

    More curves

    Final stretch

    Saved for further processing in Affinity Photo

Affinity Photo:

    Saturation and vibrance

    Cropped and re-sampled for web
title: NGC 3576 - A Statue in the Midst
